What advantage does the multivalent form: Enhanced potency, particularly beneficial for vulnerable populations
Reduced production costs and increased yield
Improved solubility and stability in physiological conditions
What is the origin of the nanobody VHH60: It was engineered from the FDA-approved nanobody caplacizumab.
It was derived from a llama immunized with SARS-CoV-2 antigens.
It was synthesized de novo using computational design techniques.
It was isolated from a human convalescent plasma sample.
